original: intros Hdec Hn. assert (dec (exists x : X, x el A /\ p x)) as Hd. - apply list_exists_dec. apply Hdec. destruct Hd as [H | H]. - apply H. - exfalso. apply Hn. apply dec_DN with (dec (forall x : X, x el A -> ~ p x)). + apply list_forall_dec. intros x. destruct (Hdec x) as [Hp | Hnp]. * right. auto. * left. intro Hx. contradiction. + auto.
